name: AttachCameraToObject
notes: You need to create the object first, before attempting to attach a player camera for that.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: You can use this function to attach the player camera to objects.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player which will have your camera attached on object.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The object id which you want to attach the player camera.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn: AttachCameraToPlayerObject: Attaches the player's camera to a player object.
